description: This file defines the 'WorkoutsFragment' class, which is a UI component in an Android application. It handles displaying a list of workout logs, provides functionality to add new workouts through a dialog, and manages interactions with the WorkoutRepository and WorkoutAdapter.

classes.name: WorkoutsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays workout logs in a RecyclerView, supports adding new workouts via a dialog, and updates its list of workouts when resumed.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, setting up the WorkoutRepository and enabling options menu.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu with an add button.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selection, triggering the add workout dialog when the add button is pressed.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout, sets up the RecyclerView with its layout manager and adapter.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Updates the adapter with the current list of workouts whenever the fragment resumes.

methods.name: showAddDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog for adding a new workout, collects input data, adds it to the repository, and updates the list.
